visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar area chart with the following specifications: Chart type: area, Chart title: 'Polar Area Chart with Connect Null Values', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for labels and titles, Data series: One series with data [1, 1, null, 1, 1], Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green, Additional configurations: Set chart margins, background, and legend.

title.text: Polar Area Chart with Connect Null Values

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a polar area chart with specific customizations. The chart type is set to 'area' with 'polar' enabled, creating a circular chart. The chart's background is a dark color (#2c3e50) with white text styling for labels and titles, ensuring readability. The data series includes one series with values [1, 1, null, 1, 1], where null values are connected, as specified by 'connectNulls: true'. The area color is a gradient from blue to green, enhancing visual appeal. Additional configurations include setting chart margins and a legend with white text for better contrast on the dark background.
